website_summaries.verdict: A colorful toy that provides hours of stimulation.
pros: Intricate puzzle balls keep kids engaged and focused
Made from colorful and durable plastic
Includes easy-to-follow instructions for each puzzle
cons: May be difficult for children under 5 years old

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to fill easter eggs with, I assumed they were the size of the quarter machine ones, but when they arrived I was surprised at the size, they are as big as my palm, but I'm not disappointed, although I can't stuff them in easter eggs they look cool and like so much fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fun and frustration.
customer_reviews.text: Came with 3 of each puzzle. The Star shaped and ball puzzle can be completed by young child. The gear shaped and other round puzzle are difficult even for adults. Fun product. Enjoyable for all, with minor frustration that is to be expected with puzzles.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $. Cheep and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Don’t fit together, we get them apart and they never go back again! Hey also have a strange smell. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Not for young children
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put in a prize box for my kids. I am extremely disappointed in them. My kids were extremely disappointed when they couldn't put them back together. The little instructions that come with it are useless. They are made of very cheap plastic that breaks and/or falls apart easily. These are geared more towards adults than children. I wanted money buying these. I do not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for party favors and they were perfect sized. they were individually wrapped
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for party favors and they were perfect sized. they were individually wrapped, with a small solution printed in each packet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great prize items
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as prizes for community kids' bingo. They were a big hit. Colorful, well constructed and fun activity for ages 6-15.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Olson

customer_reviews.title: A bit deceiving...
customer_reviews.text: These are great palm size puzzles. Ages 3 and up? I definitely would not give to anyone unless at least 8 to 10 years old. The ball was easier. We have not tried the star yet. The rings and the half moon shapes puzzles are extremely difficult even as an adult. We got these as party favors for an autism/adhd birthday party, caused more frustrations. The site says "clear directions" which is not accurate. The tiny little sheet about 1 1/2" x 4 " is very hard to see and is completely black on white. You better LOVE puzzles to do these. Left us frustrated instead of having useful fidgets.
customer_reviews.author: LPalma

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to solve
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a training facilitator to encourage participants to fidget if it helped them pay attention. When apart, it is not clear what they should look like when put back together. So they just sit there every time. Because it's not possible to know what it's supposed to look like when the pieces are apart, there's nothing participants can do to even begin assembling them. Even with the mini "instructions" provided, we couldn't complete them without a third hand/second person helping. Complete waste, if I could I'd return them.
customer_reviews.author: moMaven

customer_reviews.title: Goody bag stuffers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as goody bag stuffers for my three year old's birthday party. I like that they are so colorful and even though a three-year-old might not be able to solve the puzzles yet, they are extremely interesting to look at and handle. Great sensory manipulatives!
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent puzzle toy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent puzzle toy. Bought these for party bag favors and the kids loved them. My husband even helped our son and it took them a few minutes to figure out how to put it back together. Nice stimulating toy.
customer_reviews.author: Gemonthego

customer_reviews.title: a total plastic waste!
customer_reviews.text: What was this? They were supposed to be puzzles but they felt super cheap. They were very hard and confusing to put back together. I used them as part of the party activity bag and although the kids were drawn to the colors, when it was time to use them they lost interest in them, not being able to figure it out. It would help if the plastic was more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fun and challenging for all ages
customer_reviews.text: These are fun, getting 12 puzzles for like 8 bucks is not a bad deal. I brought these to work, I'm a mental health counselor and I work with a lot of younger kids. It's nice to have something fun to do, however, these are actually quite tricky. The directions are difficult to interpret, but the puzzles are not impossible to put together. Be warned, they are challenging, could take a while to put back together.
customer_reviews.author: noky64

customer_reviews.title: Not fun, Waste of plastic
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say, these "puzzles" are terrible..review by my 5 grandchildren ages 6-18. Lost interest in the first 2-3 minutes, as they do not go together as instructed, and my grandchildren are all above average performers one is an engineering student, so maybe it takes a less advanced mind to figure this out. Not even going to return, not worth my time.
customer_reviews.author: Shopsalot

customer_reviews.title: get better graphics in the instructions
customer_reviews.text: Looked so appealing. I tried with no success. the included instructions were AWFUL!! Small and confusing, too frustrating for me. Husband tried it and it took him almost a half hour, and he did not like the job. My grandsons opened two of them and put them down. They walked out and never went back to try again. However, a friend's child who loves puzzles put them altogether in a flash!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Maryanne Quinn Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Kids love!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toy. It was perfect for my sons birthday party as a thank you gift. All of the children really focused on this goody in their bag over everything else. Good size great quality. Packaging was sufficient. Arrived timely also. Best part is that it is different/unique from the usual good bag gifts. Something the kids will continue to get hours of fun out of while honing their problem solving and fine motor skills! I would highly recommend. I have no vested interest in writing this review other than sharing the awesomeness of the toy.
customer_reviews.author: Craftinista Wonder Woman

customer_reviews.title: A bit challenging
customer_reviews.text: Hello - I loved that there are a few different options of the puzzle balls. I bought these as prizes for my daughter's Christmas party at school. We opened one and it was a bit challenging. We were lucky still have a completed one close by to see how it actually fit together. The small piece of paper outlining the directions was hard to read and wish it could've been color coded but realize that is hard to do. Maybe include a color picture of the completed puzzle with the instructions though. Overall, I think the kids will enjoy them. Hoping the don't find them too challenging. Thanks for the quick delivery and great price! --Tonia
customer_reviews.author: Friendly user

customer_reviews.title: Good for Goody Bags!
customer_reviews.text: We used these as part of the loot in goody bags for grandson's 5th birthday. Product is excellent for that purpose. They are nice, colorful puzzle toys.
customer_reviews.author: j. kasyrp

customer_reviews.title: So much better in a party goody bag than erasers or stickers
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased to put in a party favor bag for a 9 year old boy's (3rd Grade) birthday party. I didn't want to give the same old favors (stickers, pencils, tattoos) that go home and get tossed immediately. So instead did the puzzle balls along with light up squeaky balls and full size push pops etc. Party was on a Saturday. Monday I was told by two parents that their sons thought the goody bags were the best they had ever brought home. Mission accomplished!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, weird to solve
customer_reviews.text: Puzzles are cheaply made, instructions can be hard to follow for a child. One of my star-shaped puzzles is missing the solid block piece that makes it easily solvable, which means the user has to force the pieces together a bit awkwardly. The star-shaped puzzle especially is difficult to solve using the instructions. The gear puzzle is easy to solve, but difficult to actually put together; I am generally pretty good at this sort of puzzle, but I’ve been totally unable to get all of these pieces to stay together. The two spherical puzzles are pretty good. The pieces are cheaply made, just like the others, but they’re not too difficult to solve.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: So much fun, for all ages... Seriously!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, I couldn't have asked for a better set of puzzles! Haha, I literally had some of my co-workers asking me where I got them! They had so much fun (some even complained their day was "less productive" because they were having a hard time) no one could put theirs down! I said "pssh please, y'all were enthralled!" Some were easier than others, that cog one had them all puzzled!! Best stocking stuffers ever! (And these people are over 20... They were so mad the age range was 3-5, haha). Seriously, best purchase ever.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bonefas

customer_reviews.title: Difficult!
customer_reviews.text: Some of these puzzles were possible for an adult to do, but children could not do any of them at all! Some were impossible to get back together for anyone - even the smartest or most diligent adult.
customer_reviews.author: A. Philippides

customer_reviews.title: Clever and inexpensive but not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect them to be great quality for the price. They're fun puzzles, but I'd given them as gifts (stocking stuffers for a couple of families) and it seems that most of the feedback I'm getting is that they're not being used. Adults seem to give up on them too quickly, teens aren't interested in them and they're too difficult for young children. I think they're clever and enjoyed them, however. To each his own. Know your intended recipient before purchasing them
customer_reviews.author: CYCOLOGISTTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely awful, not even gumball machine quality. Huge disappointment as these were gift/rewards for my CCD kids and I had no idea how terrible they were until they were opened by the kids. Not a very good reward/message at all. Honestly, happy meal toys are 1000 times better quality than these awful things
customer_reviews.author: Val the Most

customer_reviews.title: Too hard for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Product was shipped promptly. I bought for 6 year olds birthday party favor gifts. These are no way near for 6 year olds. My husband had a difficult time with most. Not for kids, maybe just adults.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Doman

customer_reviews.title: Challenging Puzzles but Good for the Brain
customer_reviews.text: Love these puzzles but they are a challenge for me. So colorful and a great size: not too large and not too small. Nice that there are several puzzles that are each different. The instructions on how to put these together is WAY too small and hard to follow. You can find some better instructions by watching youtube videos of children putting them together. I still have to watch them if I have not put one together for a while. Good little toy that can be included in a pinata or given as small gift.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive 12
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start with the good, For the price the product is what it says it is. They’re decent quality and do come with individual instructions. My biggest gripe is that I ordered this because it was supposed to be a 12pk and I had 12 kids but only 11 of these came. So I had to improvise for the 12th kid. Some quality control and these would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for gift bags for a toddler birthday party and they are not worth the money. A party favor bag is probably all they are good for. They have plastic molding hanging off them and are really just plastic junk. I’m not returning them but I do not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer 831

customer_reviews.title: Great party favors
customer_reviews.text: These were awesome and made great party favors. I give 4 stars instead of 5 because of the gear puzzle. It’s less of a puzzle and more of a quandary on how to hold 6 things at once. Not being an octopus I had to resort to using playdoh to assist in the assembling of the gear one for my kiddo. The other puzzles seem better
customer_reviews.author: bostnrulz

customer_reviews.title: Great small gift
customer_reviews.text: These were a fun find to add to my daughter's birthday party goody bags. They could go with any theme. Our guests were all 8-14 years old, so it was a good fit for that age. And since they are gender neutral, would be fun for all! Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Torgerson

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting something more cheaply made for the cost. But they're a challenge to put back together, come with instructions for each puzzle. For kids who need work with fine motor skills, this good buy for the cost. Nice stocking stuffers.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Kylean

customer_reviews.title: Good service. Product is fine for the price
customer_reviews.text: We gave these out in goodie bags at my daughters birthday party. Good service. Product is fine for the price. My only issue is with the puzzle that looks kinda like a rubix cube. It has very pointy edges which I don’t feel are safe. The Other pieces are good and the kids seemed to like them.
customer_reviews.author: CCorn8312

customer_reviews.title: A fun challenge
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a carnival prize for a family reunion. Most of the puzzles were too hard for the under 10 crowd, but all the older kids, plus many of the adults were intrigued by the puzzles. The round one actually required 2 people to get it together (at least 4 hands are needed), but my grandchildren loved them
customer_reviews.author: 50-something

customer_reviews.title: Great party favor!
customer_reviews.text: Purchasd as a party-favor for an 11 year old's birthday party. Kids really enjoyed them. Some are quite hard to figure out! Well made too. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jack's mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stocking  gifts for the family.
customer_reviews.text: I grew up playing with puzzles like these & love that they are back. Great stocking gifts for the whole family love the. They look great, they’re bigger that I thought so hopefully they’ll be easier to assemble. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Almost there
customer_reviews.text: The puzzles are super cute but I thought they were going to be easier to manage for a child. I am unable to take even one of them apart in order to try to put it back together. The edges are also very sharp, too sharp for a child. I had to return them. Keep working to better this product because they are the only thing like them for goodie bags.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn T.

customer_reviews.title: Puzzling
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a "thank you" bag filler. The product is of a decent quality. Instructions that came with individual puzzles are a little hard to decipher. It a good party favor for the patient thinkers. Fun, but wish 18 pcs or 24 pcs packages were available.
customer_reviews.author: jazznlyric

customer_reviews.title: Fine for adults or older kids, but not younger kids.
customer_reviews.text: I was going to give these out at halloween to kids with food allergies but these were not finished completely. They had lots of small plastic bits or sharp edges; fine for older kids and adults but I would not give them to really young children. The puzzles that look like interlocking circles/gears are way too hard to put back together and require a third hand or something.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff in DC

customer_reviews.title: I think for a child's birthday party these would be fun but not what I expected and not a good ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected at all. Plastic and cheaply made but then again, the price reflects that. I think for a child's birthday party these would be fun but not what I expected and not a good fit for a 60 birthday party. I bought forva pinata we were doing but went with something different
customer_reviews.author: bearsrfun

customer_reviews.title: They are very well made and seem like they will hold up well to use by children ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these puzzles to put into the twenty plus Christmas stockings that I do year. So far no one has have a chance to use them. They are very well made and seem like they will hold up well to use by children of multiple ages. I will update this review once they have been opened and used.
customer_reviews.author: Joann L. Price

customer_reviews.title: Too hard for kids
customer_reviews.text: These come with 'instructions' but they aren't really. You just have to pull it apart and hope you can figure it out again. Luckily we kept one together and used it as a visual guide to solve it. Adults had a hard time putting these back together so don't buy these for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Inner Child

customer_reviews.title: Great party favcors
customer_reviews.text: Gave them all away at a party, didn't get a chance to try any. Don't know if the kids liked it or not, but figured at least 1 of the kids has to be a nerd and like puzzles instead of phone games!! :)
customer_reviews.author: bacalhau75

customer_reviews.title: good challenge for price
customer_reviews.text: Gave these out at a 13 year old party. They are a good game and the kids seemed interested. We don't know how long they lasted or whether they attempted to play with these puzzles repeatedly. Nice party favor for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Hogue

customer_reviews.title: Very unique
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time like it was supposed to. These are for my daughter's birthday party which is tomorrow BUT I let my 13yr old son play around with one just to see if he could solve one. It took him two days but he was able to do it. He was so proud of himself for solving a children's toy.....go figure! hahahahaaaaa
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Fall apart easily
customer_reviews.text: Kids tried to put together but some would not stay.
customer_reviews.author: Kay R.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money for us...
customer_reviews.text: The product says they are for 5+. They are different skill levels but I will say the gear puzzle was too hard for 3 grown men to manage. I would not recommend these for party favors for any young child. Wish I could return them...
customer_reviews.author: L Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Suits my needs
customer_reviews.text: Kids haven't tried them out yet, but colors are bright, puzzles look interestin. As for durability, I won't know until the Christmas party. But they look like they are worth the price. Looks like fun.
customer_reviews.author: pauline johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very hard!
customer_reviews.text: These brain teasers are hard for even adults to figure out. The "instructions" if you want to call them that, don't make much sense (but you can google the solution). I got these for a 5 year old, way above his level. Just know that going in, not really good for most kids.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Grossmann

customer_reviews.title: Fun little gifts for party bags
customer_reviews.text: Fun little gifts for party bags. I love these cause the kids will sit there and try to figure out how it goes. Keeps them occupied!
customer_reviews.author: Amberh80

customer_reviews.title: Fun Party Favors...but Not Easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as party favors for my son's 10th birthday. Some were pretty difficult for the kids to figure out and eventually got abandoned, though I think it's worth noting that they were doing this during the party. They may have had more patience at home without other distractions. My husband and I tried to put them together and they were difficult to do, we still haven't figured them out. The instructions are small and hard to interpret so it wasn't much help. I think these could be fun and challenging, but some were a little too difficult.
customer_reviews.author: gailg

customer_reviews.title: hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: a hit for the older kids at my birthday party. this kept and still keeps them entertained for hours. a must if you have older children.
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had hoped for
customer_reviews.text: The students who selected this from my treasure box were as puzzled as I was as to how the puzzles work. One puzzle in particular looked like gears, and there did not appear to be any way for them to link or connect in any way. Will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Acadmically Dedicated

customer_reviews.title: A wide array of difficulty
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a prize box. Two puzzles are easy for my 8 year old but the other two puzzles are difficult to hold. The printed instructions are hard to understand. However online it is easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How do these work?
customer_reviews.text: Got these for the grandkids’ Halloween bags. I thought it was a great idea but no one can figure out how they work! The instructions that come inside each package are kind of a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a great idea for an 11 year old's birthday pinata however, the puzzle seemed almost impossible to get back together and it just ended up being a colorful mess on the floor. Also extremely fun to step on in the middle of the night :)
customer_reviews.author: Natty-Vin

customer_reviews.title: Very fun - very hard plastic
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple of kids tear into theirs and then leave the pieces on the floor. Plastic so hard that I had a couple of teens go to ground when they stepped on them. Made me laugh.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Beaird

customer_reviews.title: Glad I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Always looking for something different for "End of Year" bags for the children our church mentors during the school year. The puzzle balls will help with the dexterity. Easy to take apart and if you cannot figure out how to put it back together, (I'm old) there is a website with video.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: These are a fun and unique party favor for 7 years and older ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a fun and unique party favor for 7 years and older children. The puzzles are challenging even with the instructions since they show which piece but not how to orient it.
customer_reviews.author: KER

customer_reviews.title: Fun and challenging
customer_reviews.text: These puzzles are great party favors, although they are probably too challenging for the majority of the 6 and 7 year olds that we gave them out to. Kids several years older would probably enjoy them more. They do come with instructions, but the instructions are a bit hard to follow... it would be better if they were in color. But they are a good deal and do make a fun party favor for the right group of kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Minior

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: We used these As my sons valentines gift. Perfect for kids in the 6th grade although still a little difficult for most to put back together. Great product though! Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Luckylulu

customer_reviews.title: Creative Toy Favors
customer_reviews.text: This party favor is very creative and fun for the kids to play with. When Vendor mails them out, it should be in a bubble wrap type packaging. One of the toys came broken.
customer_reviews.author: Cynt

customer_reviews.title: colorful, fun gifts
customer_reviews.text: These are fun, colorful puzzles that made a nice addition to our son's birthday goody bags. I haven't done them all, but the one I tried was challenging. Honestly might be a little tough for pre-teen kids. However they are good sized (about the size of a handball) and solid plastic. They arrived on time and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Party Favor for Older Kids
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as party favors for 8-12 year olds who attended my 3-year-old granddaughters birthday. For those that opened them, they said they enjoyed working with the puzzles. Said they were challenging.
customer_reviews.author: imatoside

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these items to include in birthday goody bags. They arrived on time and were individually wrapped with instructions. They are really great quality. The only thing I would comment on, is the instructions were not very easy to follow. Just pictures of how to put the pieces back together or take them apart, I couldn't tell. But I'm sure the kids will be able to figure it out with just playing with them. Overall great product, I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fidget toys!
customer_reviews.text: As a mental health therapists who often works with children as well as adults, I love having lots of fidget toys available in my office, and these puzzles fit right along with that. They take some concentration and energy, but they're lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: B Brinton

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to writing this review....ordered these for my daughter's goodie bags for her birthday. Filled over 20 bags and not 1 kid could figure out how to use them, the directions are not in English and when they tried to figure it out on their own, they broke. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t throw away instructions
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for 2nd and 3rd graders school event. It looked fun. Unfortunately the kids were pulling them out of the bags and tried playing with them right away. Which wouldn’t be such a bad thing other than they would through away or misplace I nstructions that come in each bag that show how to put them back together. Without instructions most of them are doomed. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining to watch adults play with them!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for kids but so far adults have taken them over! Cant say yet how they go over with the kids, but they are a hit with the grown ups and its entertaining to watch them at play.
customer_reviews.author: LuvGr8Gizmos

customer_reviews.title: Not at all well made
customer_reviews.text: I returned these puzzles as soon as I opened them. They are not made well at all, the instructions are not clear and are so tiny you almost need a magnifying glass to read them. Then you can't figure them out. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Received used puzzles
customer_reviews.text: The puzzles I received were a returned item. 2 were open from the sealed bags and broken. Too late to return because it was the day before the party.
customer_reviews.author: F. Mok

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Colorful fun for children and adults. I got them as inexpensive Halloween toys, but will also find them to be nice birthday party treat bag items.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: great product to challenge the minds
customer_reviews.text: great product to challenge the minds. The smooth round ball was a big hit. Suggestion to seller, sell the in paks where you can pick which ones you want.
customer_reviews.author: Glorybound68

customer_reviews.title: Party bag
customer_reviews.text: Fun puzzles! They were a little hard for younger kids. Parents had a little trouble with some of them, but once they started figuring it out, it was rather fun. We started having contest to see who could reassemble them the quickest.
customer_reviews.author: david rogers

customer_reviews.title: Cute cheap frustrating.
customer_reviews.text: hard to handle, very slippery. hard to hold. gear toy falls apart on its own and I was unable to reassemble it. OK for party favor where you really don't care about guests.
customer_reviews.author: Go Away Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Christmas cheer for children
customer_reviews.text: To be truthful, we have not opened the individual wrappers. These are to be added to the other items we are buying, or making, that will go into the 2019 Christmas "shoeboxes" our church collects to send to children in Africa, and elsewhere. They appear to be nice items, and I believe that the children will love them
customer_reviews.author: the circuit rider

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Your product is exactly what I was looking for to include in a Classroom wellness kit. It is reasonably priced and every durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Oberlin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome party favor - great toy.
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with the quality of this purchase. My 8-yr-old grandson played with these for hours. It also made for a great party favor.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Maybe better for older kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my fourth-grade class and they were a little too challenging for them. The plastic and really hard and somewhere difficult to take apart (ball) and put back together. Maybe better for older kids.
customer_reviews.author: kelley hannon

customer_reviews.title: Too hard for children to put back together
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a trip present to keep my kids busy on a road trip. They had fun taking them apart, but they were frustrated because they couldn’t put them back together and play with them over and over.
customer_reviews.author: juliafriedl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size and my grandkids wants to play with them now. I had to order another 12 pack for the rest of the kids. Great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: There were a lot of them but they weren’t very good quality. As soon as the kids got them there were sharp edges. Not good quality.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: These were totally not what I expected and directions were--well ...
customer_reviews.text: These were totally not what I expected and directions were--well not as stated. However, I have to pay 6 dollars to return so I prefer to throw them away ---what a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Elston

customer_reviews.title: Look cool but nearly impossible for children to put back together
customer_reviews.text: These fidgets were purchased for a 3rd grade class party. The children thought they look really cool. Once they took their fidget apart they were almost all terribly frustrated that they could not easily put their fidget back together. The directions were not helpful. This was was a waste of my money to purchase. I would rather spend more on a fidget that can actually be enjoyed and correctly taken apart and re-configured.
customer_reviews.author: Mona B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Fun Stocking Stuffer or Party Favor
customer_reviews.text: They were small, attractive, and not expensive. Adults had a lot of fun with them at Christmas, and some of the older kids. Not for young kids, though. These are pretty small
customer_reviews.author: Doggonefool

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted but easy return policy
customer_reviews.text: I suppose these would be good for party favors as they say. I bought them as fidget toys for my adolescent psychotherapy practice, and they are terrible for that. They’re difficult puzzles, not fidget toys. And the plastic is pretty flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Katharine B.

customer_reviews.title: All my nieces & nephews ages 5 - 16 had fun with them at our Easter celebration
customer_reviews.text: These little puzzles were a real hit. All my nieces & nephews ages 5 - 16 had fun with them at our Easter celebration.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Springer

customer_reviews.title: Quality toys
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson's birthday. I was surprised at the quality and size of the toys. They are just perfect for the party prizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Bingo Time
customer_reviews.text: With COVID going out these days with the kids is difficult. So we have BINGO NIGHT at Nana's house. These game teasers are plastic and come apart pretty easy but putting them back together is not and because they are plastic we have had to through a few of them away. Not the favorite pick of the prize box.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rissman

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fund
customer_reviews.text: These are surprisingly a lot of fun for kids and grownups. We ordered a 2nd batch as party favors so everyone could have at least 2 puzzles.
customer_reviews.author: J. Carle

customer_reviews.title: Work for stocking stuffers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my kids stocking stuffers at school. Tried a few before sending them to the teachers and they weren’t very simple and a couple broke easily
customer_reviews.author: Boymom-4

customer_reviews.title: Fun to look at
customer_reviews.text: These are fun to look at with their fun shapes and bright colors. They feel very light and kind of cheap. I don't know how well they go back together or stay together.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Great brain teasers!
customer_reviews.text: Great puzzles. Great brain teasers. Some are more difficult than others. Great even for adults, maybe too hard for kids?
customer_reviews.author: NCA50

customer_reviews.title: I thought they were pretty great. Most of the kids starting playing with ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were pretty great. Most of the kids starting playing with them right away as they revived their goodie bags after my son’s bday party. Some of the kids lost interest pretty quickly though. That’s the only reason I gave these cute toys 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: israel bien

customer_reviews.title: The ones you can do are fun
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the puzzles are great fun, but the other 2 puzzles you would have to have 8 hands to hold all the pieces just right to actually put them together.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Faehnle

customer_reviews.title: Good for thinking skills
customer_reviews.text: A great product for a younger puzzle fan. With 4 different designs it adds different techniques to be used. Great for manipulating and thought skills. A good value.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Lynn

customer_reviews.title: A little bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: These puzzles seem to be larger than I expected from the picture. I don't think they will work in my capsule machine.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Party favors
customer_reviews.text: Put these out on tables during a party they were used over and over and a lot of chatter around how unique the different puzzles were . Guests then got to take them as party favors. Guests loved them and it kept some hands very busy!
customer_reviews.author: Kay  Ratermann

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and Funderful!...liked the product.
customer_reviews.text: This assortment met our expectation and was shipped and received just as hoped and anticipated. Each item arrived safe, intact, and individually wrapped which was nice. I would recommend this product and seller to anyone looking for a bright, fun, colorful play for adults as well as children. Perfect to lighten the atmosphere at a business meeting.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rock

customer_reviews.title: Unique and useful
customer_reviews.text: Added these to Easter baskets...they were well made and unique. Great alternative to candy. Also make good stocking stuffers. Price is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Junebug

customer_reviews.title: I bought them for class prizes and I’m not disappointed. They are a bit more difficult than expected ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so neat! I bought them for class prizes and I’m not disappointed. They are a bit more difficult than expected but with a but I feel they’ll help with patience and persistence!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult to reassemble
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are useless. Once you take the puzzle apart, good luck trying to get it back together again. I bought these as party favors for my child's birthday party and the kids struggled with these just as much as the adults did. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Neliblu Fun Puzzle Balls - Goody Bag Fillers - Party Favors, Party Toys, Goody Bag Favors, Carnival Prizes, Pinata Filler - Fidget Brain Teaser Puzzles (12 Pack) Clear Instructional Videos Included!
feature_bullets: KEEPS THEM FOCUSED! Tactile fidget toys are amazing for all children, but especially those with extra energy, ADD/ADHD, OCD, autism, or high stress / anxiety levels. These toys help promote a sense of calm, reduce stress, anxiety and can increase focus and attention.
KEEPS THEM ENTERTAINED! Slip one of these classic kids' toys into your pocket for something to do on the go! They're portable so they're wonderful road trip activities for your youngsters!
KEEPS THEIR MINDS SHARP! This variety of brain teaser plastic puzzles provides challenging mental exercises for sharp young minds.

GREAT PARTY FAVOR! These fun plastic puzzle balls are perfect fits for party favors goody bags, Christmas stockings and Easter eggs. Makes an excellent party favor item to give away at your next birthday party. Includes Clear Instructional videos and instruction sheets.
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE! Backed by Neliblu 100% money back guarantee and manufacturer’s warranty when purchased from an authorized reseller. 100% brand new and high quality toys.
